short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ServiceNow utility tool, search and navigate with a command palette.(personal project, not affiliated to ServiceNow)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your workflow on any ServiceNow instance with a crafted command palette.

Working with local development instances or SERVICE-NOW instances.

Click on the extension icon or use keyboard shortcut Ctrl + Shift + L (Command + Shift + L on Mac) to call out the command palette.

Keyboard shortcut can be customized from chrome://extensions/shortcuts

Key features:

üîç Search and navigate Servicenow menus, history in a command bar
üöÄ Action mode
    - search by sysid
    - shortcut go to record list or new record
    - switching between application scopes
    - Search Servicenow documentation
    - Search Next Experience components
‚å®Ô∏è Always ready for input, mouse free navigation
üåô Dark mode
